tb_top
module tb_top

Top-level testbench module for REGBUS protocol verification

This module serves as the top-level testbench that instantiates the DUT, creates the REGBUS interface (which is APB-like), generates clock and reset signals, and initiates the UVM test. It provides the complete testbench infrastructure for REGBUS protocol verification.

pslverr(dut_if.pslverr)
)

Device Under Test (DUT) instance

This module instance represents the register block design that implements the REGBUS protocol interface. It connects to the REGBUS interface signals for verification.
